data.text: @WalesOnline There he is the man in the ill fitting suits

@WalesOnline David Frost is spot on. As for @MarkDrakeford  he is guilty of extreme over reach. He’s even referred to himself as Welsh Prime Minister. Over the coming months when Covid policies are scrutinised, he should be held accountable like all others who have ruined lives unnecessarily.

@WalesOnline Mark Drakeford @PrifWeinidog  is no Leader. He couldn't leader a piss up in a brewery. He's  just a boss of a political party that likes to throw his weight around spend tax payers money and stick his nose where its not wanted.
@Maerdydd @Tumblescarlet67 @WalesOnline Wales is a country? Are you joking?
@WalesOnline Delusions of grandeur has Drakeford. He is just being petty and as awkward as possible towards us and Westminster
@WalesOnline There a war going on in the Ukraine and he’s more interested in his useless piss poor rules
@WalesOnline If @PrifWeinidog is so proud of his handling of the pandemic, then why is he refusing a Wales only inquiry…… because he’s full of shit.
@WalesOnline He can say what he wants, nobody is listening, least of all Boris
